languages.text: "Смотрел, как бьют моего работника. Жаль парня, но помочь я ему ничем не мог". {n}Бригадир криво усмехается, показывая желтые зубы. В переднем ряду выбиты почти все.{/n} "Уже заступался. Больше не хочу".

"Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."
languages.original_text: "Смотрел, как бьют моего работника. Жаль парня, но помочь я ему ничем не мог". {n}Бригадир криво усмехается, показывая желтые зубы. В переднем ряду выбиты почти все.{/n} "Уже заступался. Больше не хочу".

traits.locale_text: "Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."
{n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones are missing.{/n} "I've tried standing up for them. Really put me off trying again."

"Watching one of my workers take a beating. I felt sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, revealing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past — not doing it again."

"Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."

"Watching one of my workers take a beating. I felt sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, revealing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past — not doing it again."

"Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."

languages.text: «Ver cómo le propinaban una paliza a uno de mis trabajadores. Me da pena el chaval, pero no podía hacer nada por él». {n}El capataz sonríe con amargura, enseñando sus dientes amarillentos. Le faltan casi todos los de delante.{/n} «Ya me jugué el cuello una vez. No pienso volver a hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."

traits.locale_text: «Ver cómo le propinaban una paliza a uno de mis trabajadores. Me da pena el chaval, pero no podía hacer nada por él». {n}El capataz sonríe con amargura, enseñando sus dientes amarillentos. Le faltan casi todos los de delante.{/n} «Ya me jugué el cuello una vez. No pienso volver a hacerlo».

languages.text: 「労働者の一人が殴られるのを見ていました。あの若者には同情しますが、私にはどうすることもできませんでした」{n}作業長は、その黄色い歯を見せて不敵に笑う。その前歯は、ほぼすべてが抜け落ちている。{/n}「過去に首を突っ込んだことがありましたが…もう二度とやりませんよ」
languages.original_text: "Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."

traits.locale_text: 「労働者の一人が殴られるのを見ていました。あの若者には同情しますが、私にはどうすることもできませんでした」{n}作業長は、その黄色い歯を見せて不敵に笑う。その前歯は、ほぼすべてが抜け落ちている。{/n}「過去に首を突っ込んだことがありましたが…もう二度とやりませんよ」

languages.text: “我在眼睁睁看着我手底下的小伙子挨揍，我真的很难受，但我无能为力。”{n}工头苦笑着，露出参差不齐的黄牙，几乎所有的门牙都被打掉了。{/n}“我也为他们挺身而出过，但这种事我可不想再干了。”
languages.original_text: "Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."

traits.locale_text: “我在眼睁睁看着我手底下的小伙子挨揍，我真的很难受，但我无能为力。”{n}工头苦笑着，露出参差不齐的黄牙，几乎所有的门牙都被打掉了。{/n}“我也为他们挺身而出过，但这种事我可不想再干了。”

languages.text: "Zugesehen, wie einer meiner Arbeiter verprügelt wurde. Tut mir leid für den Burschen, aber ich konnte nichts tun." {n}Der Vorarbeiter lächelt schief und entblößt dabei seine gelben Zähne. Er hat selbst fast keine Schneidezähne mehr.{/n} "Früher habe ich mich in Dinge eingemischt. Aber die Zeiten sind vorbei."
languages.original_text: "Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."

traits.locale_text: "Zugesehen, wie einer meiner Arbeiter verprügelt wurde. Tut mir leid für den Burschen, aber ich konnte nichts tun." {n}Der Vorarbeiter lächelt schief und entblößt dabei seine gelben Zähne. Er hat selbst fast keine Schneidezähne mehr.{/n} "Früher habe ich mich in Dinge eingemischt. Aber die Zeiten sind vorbei."

languages.text: « Je regardais un de mes ouvriers se prendre une raclée. Je suis désolé pour lui, mais je ne pouvais rien pour l'aider. » {n}Le contremaître esquisse un sourire ironique, dévoilant au passage ses dents jaunies. Presque toutes celles du devant manquent à l'appel.{/n} « J'ai déjà essayé de m'interposer par le passé, et je suis pas près de recommencer. »
languages.original_text: "Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."

traits.locale_text: « Je regardais un de mes ouvriers se prendre une raclée. Je suis désolé pour lui, mais je ne pouvais rien pour l'aider. » {n}Le contremaître esquisse un sourire ironique, dévoilant au passage ses dents jaunies. Presque toutes celles du devant manquent à l'appel.{/n} « J'ai déjà essayé de m'interposer par le passé, et je suis pas près de recommencer. »

languages.text: "İşçilerimden birinin dayak yiyişini izliyordum. Delikanlı için üzülüyorum ama elimden bir şey gelmedi." {n}Ustabaşı, huysuzca gülümseyerek sararan dişlerini açığa çıkarıyor. Ön dişlerinin neredeyse tamamı dökülmüş.{/n} "Geçmişte kendimi ateşe attığım olmuştu. Bir daha asla yapmam."
languages.original_text: "Watching one of my workers take a beating. I feel sorry for the lad, but there was nothing I could do." {n}The Foreman smiles wryly, showing his yellowed teeth. Almost all of the front ones have been knocked out.{/n} "I've stuck my neck out in the past. Not doing it again."
